    • Uses of SparkTrainingStats in org.deeplearning4j.spark.stats

      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.spark.stats with parameters of type SparkTrainingStats 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void StatsUtils.exportStatsAsHTML(SparkTrainingStats sparkTrainingStats, long maxTimelineSizeMs, OutputStream outputStream)
      Generate and export a HTML representation (including charts, etc) of the Spark training statistics
      This overload is for writing to an output stream
      static void StatsUtils.exportStatsAsHtml(SparkTrainingStats sparkTrainingStats, long maxTimelineSizeMs, String path, org.apache.spark.SparkContext sc)
      Generate and export a HTML representation (including charts, etc) of the Spark training statistics
      Note: exporting is done via Spark, so the path here can be a local file, HDFS, etc.
      static void StatsUtils.exportStatsAsHTML(SparkTrainingStats sparkTrainingStats, OutputStream outputStream)
      Generate and export a HTML representation (including charts, etc) of the Spark training statistics
      This overload is for writing to an output stream
      static void StatsUtils.exportStatsAsHtml(SparkTrainingStats sparkTrainingStats, String path, org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc) 
      static void StatsUtils.exportStatsAsHtml(SparkTrainingStats sparkTrainingStats, String path, org.apache.spark.SparkContext sc)
      Generate and export a HTML representation (including charts, etc) of the Spark training statistics
      Note: exporting is done via Spark, so the path here can be a local file, HDFS, etc.
